input.sentences: we arrived at the beautiful tudor style home ... it even had a swing set .
we could n't believe our lodgings for the week .
we gladly flew the british flag for this beauty ...
we closed our first night with an american revolution statue .
output.sentences: I looked out at the swing set in the play ground from my window and saw deep snow and I would not be swinging there today.
This English style buidling would soon be all white under the heavy snow fall coming our way.
There was no doubt about this scene buidling being British.
Somebody identified the white stuff on the ground writing "SNOW" like we did not know it.
This statue of a soldier looked stern and focused on his mission.
